member.name: T:PFThreads.PFCurrentThread
member.summary: Class to manage the currently executing thread.

member.name: M:PFThreads.PFCurrentThread.Wait(System.Int32)
member.summary: Pauses current executing thread the specified number of seconds.
member.param: Number of seconds to wait before resuming thread.
member.remarks: Specify zero to indicate that curent thread should be suspended to allow other waiting threads to execute.

member.name: M:PFThreads.PFCurrentThread.Sleep(System.Int32)
member.summary: Pauses current executing thread the specified number of milliseconds.
member.param: Number of milliseconds to wait before resuming thread.
member.remarks: Specify zero to indicate that curent thread should be suspended to allow other waiting threads to execute.

member.name: M:PFThreads.PFCurrentThread.Sleep(System.TimeSpan)
member.summary: Pauses current executing thread for the amount of time specified in the TimeSpan parameter.
member.param: TimeSpan object that specifies how much time to suspend the current thread.
